title: The Vampire's Chosen
description: After a hit-and-run accident left him paralyzed and in a rehab center, Austin didn’t have a lot of hope for his future. Dr. Michelin made a lot of promises, but after a year, Austin was starting to doubt whether he would ever walk again. Austin knew his brother Scott was paying dearly for the room in the rehab center and he desperately wanted to pay his brother back, but he didn’t know how he was ever going to get out of his bed. His world turned on its axis when Liam O’Connell walked into his life. Austin hardly felt desirable, yet Liam looked at him like he was wanted and precious. With Liam and the help of Scott and his new love Hugo Durant, Austin feels the first glimmers of hope in a long time. Life sadly never goes according to plan. Dangers exist that could threaten Austin’s recovery and his relationship with Liam. Can they overcome these trials and find their forever after?  Liam is struck instantly by Austin’s beauty. The over eighty year old vampire never expected to find his beloved in that hospital bed, paralyzed from the waist down, but from that moment he knew he would find a way to care for and heal his love. It wouldn’t be easy and danger lurks around every corner, but Liam is determined that his beloved would know the true meaning of love and care. Even if Liam has to take out everyone in the world to do it, no one will stand in the way of Liam’s beloved.
author: B.A. Stretke
